mapper.insert:
insert into claiminfo(claimId, claimDate, totalPrice, claimerId, claimer_accountNumber, meetingId) values(#{claimId}, #{claimDate}, #{totalPrice}, #{claimerId}, #{claimer_accountNumber}, #{meetingId})
select claimId_seq.nextval from dual
mapper.select: select c.claimId, c.claimDate, c.totalPrice, c.claimerId, c.claimer_accountNumber, e.paymentId, e.paymentDate, e.isPaid, e.tran_amt, e.claimId, e.claimeeId, e.claimee_accountNumber, r.receiptId, r.receiptImg, r.claimId from ClaimInfo c, ClaimeeInfo e, ReceiptInfo r where c.claimId = e.claimId(+) and c.claimId = r.claimId(+) and c.claimId= #{claimId}

select c.claimId, c.claimDate, c.totalPrice, c.claimerId, c.claimer_accountNumber, e.paymentId, e.paymentDate, e.isPaid, e.tran_amt, e.claimId, e.claimeeId, e.claimee_accountNumber, r.receiptId, r.receiptImg, r.claimId from ClaimInfo c, ClaimeeInfo e, ReceiptInfo r where c.claimId = e.claimId(+) and c.claimId = r.claimId(+) and (c.claimerId= #{userId} or e.claimeeId= #{userId})

select c.claimId, c.claimDate, c.totalPrice, c.claimerId, c.claimer_accountNumber, e.paymentId, e.paymentDate, e.isPaid, e.tran_amt, e.claimId, e.claimeeId, e.claimee_accountNumber, r.receiptId, r.receiptImg, r.claimId from ClaimInfo c, ClaimeeInfo e, ReceiptInfo r where c.claimId = e.claimId(+) and c.claimId = r.claimId(+) and ( ((c.claimerId, e.claimeeId) in (select #{myId}, #{yourId} from dual)) OR ((c.claimerId, e.claimeeId) in (select #{yourId}, #{myId} from dual)) ) order by c.claimdate

select c.claimId, c.claimDate, c.totalPrice, c.claimerId, c.claimer_accountNumber, e.paymentId, e.paymentDate, e.isPaid, e.tran_amt, e.claimId, e.claimeeId, e.claimee_accountNumber, r.receiptId, r.receiptImg, r.claimId from ClaimInfo c, ClaimeeInfo e, ReceiptInfo r where c.claimId = e.claimId(+) and c.claimId = r.claimId(+) and c.meetingId= #{meetingId}
